sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import {BsThreeDotsVertical} from "react-icons/bs" import {Users} from "../dummyData" export default function Post({post}) { const [like,setLike] = useState(post.like); function handleLike(){ setLike(like+1); } function handleDisLike(){ if(like === 0 ) setLike(like-1); } return (
{Users.filter(u => u.id === post.userId)[0].username} {post.date}
{post.desc}
{like} People's like
{post.comment} comment's
) }
